rules: Headings must use Manrope. Do not use Inter for headings.
Use tight letter spacing for headings (-0.02em).
Body text should have relaxed line height (1.6) for readability.

colors.palette_notes: Primary Green for Buttons/CTAs. Secondary Dark Green for Text/Headings. Accent Light Green for backgrounds/highlights.

spacing_layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid for Services (Asymmetrical). Standard responsive grid for features.

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#2E7D32] border-2 border-[#2E7D32] hover:bg-[#E8F5E9] transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold

inputs.default: w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-xl border border-gray-200 focus:border-[#4CAF50] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#4CAF50]/20 outline-none transition-all

animations.description: Hero Section: 3D Tooth Implant. Interactive, rotating, sparkling. Use a Cylinder/Capsule geometry stack to simulate an implant if no model is available, or search for a free 'tooth.glb'. Add ambient light and spotlight to make it glow.
Teeth Transformation. A row of procedural teeth (rounded boxes/capsules). Animate color from dark (decay) to white (healthy).
Implant Procedure. Step-by-step visual. Show a 'screw' (cylinder with thread texture) entering a 'gum' (pink soft mesh).
Whitening Smile. A 3D shape resembling a smile arc. Animate material emissive intensity to simulate whitening.

three_d_strategy.performance: Use `drei` <Float>, <Environment> for realism. Lazy load models. Fallback to CSS placeholders if WebGL fails.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Do NOT use 'transparent' backgrounds for dropdowns/overlays.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', '@react-three/fiber', '@react-three/drei', 'react-router-dom', 'sonner'. 2. Set up the Tailwind config with the specified colors. 3. Create the layout with Navbar and Footer. 4. Implement pages with their respective 3D components (create simple procedural 3D placeholders if complex models are missing). 5. Ensure the contact form hits the backend.
